metadata.synopsis: Player clicks on elevator leading to the shadow-cursed lands. Nearby gnome  butts in to let you know you don't look like you're in any shape to go up there. The land is cursed, and you need a moonlantern. Plays only once.

48.speaker: Skickpit
48.text: You're going up there? You've either got iron guts - or one of those Moonlanterns.

5.speaker: Skickpit
5.text: One of Nere's magic lamps. You won't last without one.

51.speaker: Skickpit
51.text: The death-dark's clogged the top-land, clear to Moonrise Towers. Only a Moonlantern dispels it.

45.speaker: Skickpit
45.text: Shadows - thick as a duerro's skull. Sucks the breath right out of your lungs.

28.speaker: Skickpit
28.text: Go on up, if you fancy. Me? I'd sooner take a swim in the Darklake.

37.speaker: Lae'zel
37.text: The surface is within reach. Forget Nere, forget the Moonlantern - I hardly fear a few shadows.

50.speaker: Shadowheart
50.text: No surprises that there's danger ahead, but at least we're getting closer. Leave Nere to rot - we should press on.

16.speaker: Karlach
16.text: Erm. Shouldn't we go grab that Moonlantern before wandering into what sounds an awful lot like an abyss?

44.speaker: Player
44.text: That Moonlantern is key to our survival. And that means freeing Nere.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: We should move on, 'death-dark' or not.

31.speaker: Astarion
31.text: Let's just go, Nere and the Moonlantern be damned. After everything we've been through, I think we can handle a few shadows.

49.speaker: Wyll
49.text: I'm not so keen on taking a shadow-nap, myself. We need to free Nere and get that Moonlantern.

30.speaker: Gale
30.text: 'Death-dark' doesn't sound very inviting. Can't say I fancy our chances without freeing Nere and getting that Moonlantern.

10.speaker: Lae'zel
10.text: He speaks of the shadow curse. Forget Nere and the Moonlantern - if we're this close to the surface, we must chance the journey.

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.text: Sounds like the shadow curse. We must be getting close. Forget Nere and the Moonlantern -  let's just press on.

8.speaker: Karlach
8.text: Must be the shadow curse. I really don't think we should go wandering in without protection.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: That Moonlantern is key to our survival. And that means freeing Nere.

20.speaker: Lae'zel
20.text: Chk - more time wasted. If only you feared the ghaik parasite half as much as you fear the dark.

19.speaker: Shadowheart
19.text: Let's just hope you're right. Otherwise we're just aiding the enemy.

33.speaker: Astarion
33.text: Afraid of the dark, are we? Very well - let us save Nere, if we must.
33.context: NodeContext: [Astarion - with a sigh before 'very well']

39.speaker: Wyll
39.text: There we have it. Let 'Operation Free Nere' commence.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Moonrise Towers holds the answers we seek. Curse or not, we can't turn back now.

2.speaker: Lae'zel
2.text: Forward, then. No curse will keep me from purification.

43.speaker: Shadowheart
43.text: Good. After all we've been through, this is hardly the time to falter.
43.context: NodeContext: Approving of the player's decision to press onwards through danger to their goal

38.speaker: Karlach
38.text: It's your funeral. And mine. I'm not ready!

11.speaker: Astarion
11.text: Excellent. The less time I have to spend with these underdwarves, the better. Present company excluded, of course.

14.speaker: Wyll
14.text: So we're going up there without the lantern? I hope you know what you're doing.

32.speaker: Gale
32.text: A stab in the dark it is...

27.speaker: Astarion
27.text: If the cure's in Moonrise, we should go, Nere and his lantern be damned. After all, 'shadows' will be the least of our worries if we start to turn.

12.speaker: Wyll
12.text: The shadow curse. We'll need that Moonlantern from Nere to survive the journey to Moonrise Towers.

21.speaker: Gale
21.text: We were warned about the curse. Can't say I fancy our chances without a Moonlantern.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Whatever. I'm not afraid of the dark.

53.speaker: Skickpit
53.text: Well you should be. That stuff will end you in two flaps of a batwing.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Thanks for sharing. I'll keep it in mind.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I do have a Moonlantern, as it happens. Right here in my pouch.

17.speaker: Skickpit
17.text: Shit - good thing, too. You won't get far without one.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I don't have a Moonlantern. So what?

54.speaker: Skickpit
54.text: So you won't be getting far - not without one of Nere's magic lamps.
